text: Rohan Mehra (born 8 April 1990) is an Indian actor and model, known for his work in films, web series, and television. He gained popularity for his portrayal of Naksh Singhania in the popular television series Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai and Sameer Kapoor in Sasural Simar Ka. Mehra also became a household name after being a finalist on the reality TV show Bigg Boss 10. == Early Life and Education == Rohan Mehra was born on 8 April 1990. He completed his education at St. George's College, Mussoorie, Uttaranchal, where he developed an interest in acting and modeling. == Personal Life == Rohan Mehra is known for his versatile acting skills and continues to be active in the entertainment industry, making appearances in films, web shows, and television. ==References== Category:21st-century Indian actors Category:Living people Category:1990 births
title: Rohan Mehra
